analyses.title: Hard Architecture Mapping: Basic Memory
analyses.description: Comprehensive Level 1 analysis revealing Files-as-Database architecture, 5-layer clean architecture, 17 MCP tools, bidirectional sync pattern. ~25k LOC Python codebase with 957 commits.
analyses.author: GitHub Copilot
analyses.strategic_context: Establish technical ground truth for Files-as-Database pattern and MCP integration architecture

atomic.title: Decision Forensics: Basic Memory
atomic.description: Git history analysis of 957 commits revealing 7 strategic pivots: Cloud integration, DBOS removal, project-scoped sync, async I/O, Windows support, PostgreSQL experimental. Specification-driven development culture.
atomic.author: GitHub Copilot
atomic.strategic_context: Document decision patterns revealing field-driven architecture and simplification-over-features philosophy

atomic.title: Anti-Library Extraction: Basic Memory
atomic.description: Documentation of 20+ rejected approaches (custom APIs, proprietary formats, real-time collaboration) and 8 constraints-as-specifications where limitations became competitive advantages.
atomic.author: GitHub Copilot
atomic.strategic_context: Preserve negative knowledge: what NOT to build and why, preventing repeated mistakes

atomic.title: Vision Alignment: Basic Memory
atomic.description: 95.9% vision-reality alignment (47/49 claims validated). Exceptional integrity where README promises match implementation, documentation equals operational reality.
atomic.author: GitHub Copilot
atomic.strategic_context: Demonstrate exceptional software design integrity as benchmark for vision-reality alignment

process_memory.title: Process Memory: Basic Memory Investigation
process_memory.description: Epistemic history documenting 6 pivotal realizations from 'just another tool' to 'paradigm shift in AI-native knowledge work'. Investigation journey through Wisdom Ladder Levels 1-4.

distillations.title: Meta-Pattern Synthesis: Basic Memory
distillations.description: Ten universal patterns extracted: Files-as-Database, MCP-as-Universal-Interface, Bidirectional-Collaboration, Specification-Driven-Velocity, Constraint-Exploitation, Evidence-First-Scaling, Standards-First-Integration, Framework-Skepticism, Dual-Mode-Architecture, Negative-Knowledge-Documentation.
distillations.author: GitHub Copilot
distillations.strategic_context: Extract portable wisdom applicable beyond knowledge management to any AI-native system development

distillations.title: Paradigm Extraction: Basic Memory
distillations.description: Seven fundamental paradigm shifts: Files→Database Inversion, Queries→Collaboration, Proprietary→Standards, Prediction→Evidence, All-or-Nothing→Dual-Mode, Code-First→Specification-First, Constraints→Opportunities. Cultural transformation requiring 12-36 months.
distillations.author: GitHub Copilot
distillations.strategic_context: Identify fundamental worldview shifts defining AI-native knowledge work future

backlog.title: Strategic Backlog: Paradigm Adoption - Basic Memory Patterns
